definition: a stiff hair, to react in an offended or angry manner
details:
noun
- a stiff hair
- a stiff fiber (coarse hair or filament)
verb
- to react in an offended or angry manner
= example: to react in an offended or angry manner
- to rise up as in fear
= example: to rise up as in fear
= synonyms: uprise, stand up
- to have or be thickly covered with or as if with bristles
= example: to have or be thickly covered with or as if with bristles
- to be in a state of movement or action
= example: to be in a state of movement or action
= synonyms: burst
